data.text:
Title : K-pop Star Season 4Also known as: Survival Audition K-pop Star 4 (Korean: 서바이벌 오디션 K팝 스타 시즌4) PD : Screenplay : Genre : Audition | music | talent showEpisodes : Broadcast Network : SBSAiring Date : November 2014 (tentative)Airing Time : Sunday ; 4:55PM KSTPreceded by : RoommateProduction Company : Official Website :

Synopsis :Survival Audition K-pop Star (Korean: 서바이벌 오디션 K팝 스타) is a South Korean reality TV competition series where the three entertainment/talent agencies in South Korea hold worldwide auditions to find the next potential K-Pop stars. Preliminary auditions are held around the world in Asia, North America, South America, Europe, and Australia. The final winner will debut with the company of his or her choice (Antenna, YG, or JYP), along with a cash prize of three hundred million won (approx. 300,000 U.S. dollars), two brand new vehicles, opportunities to become commercial models and casting in dramas, and many more.

Hosted by : Jeon Hyun Moo

JUDGES:Yang Hyun Suk: YG Entertainment CEO, producer, singerPark Jin Young: JYP Entertainment Executive producer, producer, singer, songwriterYoo Hee Yeol: Antenna Music Singer, songwriter, composer, pianist

Video :

LINKOfficial : Facebook | Twitter | YoutubeMore.

Please follow Soompi Forum Rules.Don't post any requests for subs!Anything unrelated to the program is considered spamming. Don't quote images.01.Due to the copyright/legal problems, no illegal streaming links will/should be posted on this thread as there had been major crackdowns going on lately.02.Any complaints about any streaming links will be counted as spam and will be reported to the mods.03.Any complaints of the respective companies such as Viki, youtube, Etc.. should be report to the respective companies instead of posting your complaints here.04.Those who are caught breaking the soompi posting rules more than 5 times will have their Id/IDs reported the mods. 05.Those who are caught promoting/posting illegal streaming links with subs ( those without permission from the original subbers and doesn't have copyrights like Viki,Dramafever or Crunchyroll) will have their Id reported to the mods for endangering Soompi to legal issues for illegal streaming sites promotions.PLEASE GIVE CREDIT TO WHERE CREDIT IS DUE

SBS hints at a possible season 4 of 'K-Pop Star'SBS variety show director Ha Seung Bo commented on the success of 'K-Pop Star 3' and hinted at a possible 'K-Pop Star 4'!The director stated, "The competition among weekend variety programs is intense. Contrary to the family variety shows of other broadcast stations, 'K-Pop Star 3' has a strong uphill with its totally different content.""The contestants' names rose on portal site search rankings up until the day after the broadcast. We are thinking about it in a positive light. Although we would have to consider the comprehensive production elements for season 4, we are looking at it positively.""The 4:30 PM time slot on Sunday is a time when it's hard to focus on a music program. If you consider that aspect, the viewer ratings are not low. Although I worked on variety shows for 20 years, it is my first time seeing the #1 weekend variety program in viewer ratings regularly changing."'Roommate' will be premiering following 'K-Pop Star 3'!http://www.allkpop.com/article/2014/04/sbs-hints-at-a-possible-season-4-of-k-pop-star-----“K-Pop Star” Season 4 to Start This June

“K-Pop Star” is slated to start its fourth season this June. All three judges from last season will be returning to the show: Yang Hyun Seok, Park Jin Young, and Yoo Hee Yeol.“K-Pop Star” seasons one and two have turned out some talented artists such as season one winner Park Ji Min and runner-up Lee Hi, and season two winner Akdong Musician. The third season of “K-Pop Star,” which ended recently, is already seeing its contestants off to various agencies to start their music careers. Season three winner Bernard Park has signed with JYP, and runner-up Sam Kim and second runner-up Kwon Jin Ah will be joining judge Yoo Hee Yeol at Antenna Music. YG Entertainment has taken in Lee Chae Young and Jang Hana.What was especially notable about the latest season of “K-Pop Star” was the addition of Yoo Hee Yeol as a judge. The CEO of Antenna Music, the judge won over the hearts of viewers with his sincere critiques and his fatherly presence with the contestants.As an audition program with some of the biggest Korean record labels, “K-Pop Star” has seen some of the most talented contestants. Whether or not the new season will yield similar results remains to be seen. http://www.soompi.com/2014/05/13/k-pop-star-season-4-to-start-this-june/#.U6GEHpSSxwI-----“K-Pop Star 4″ Kicks Off Auditions, Scheduled to Begin Airing in November

SBS released on May 31 that “K-Pop Star 4” has officially gone into productions.

The fourth season of the popular audition program will start the first round of auditions starting June 1. The first round will be a phone audition, as contestants will be required to phone in.

Unlike other audition programs that met with low ratings and negative feedback in recent times, “K-Pop Star 3,” which started airing in November of 2013, was a success with very high ratings. It gained positive reviews for focusing on the contestants’ talents instead of their behind stories, and also for judges who genuinely interacted with the contestants. Yoo Hee Yeol, who joined the third season as a judge, was also met with praise.

Particularly notable is the show contestants’ success after the latest season. Winner Bernard Park has signed with JYP, while runner-up Sam Kim and top 3 Kwon Jin Ah signed with Yoo Hee Yeol’s Antenna Music. Jang Hana and Lee Chae Young have joined YG. Other top participants like Nam Young Joo also received love-calls from major agencies.

The producers of “K-Pop Star” has admitted, “we were constantly under a lot of pressure for all the seasons,” adding confidently, “we have always tried to incorporate new topics and new stories into the show, and for this season we will also be trying something new.”

“K-Pop Star 4″ will hold auditions in the United States, Europe, Oceania, and Asia throughout July. The national auditions will be held throughout the country in August and September. The phone auditions will begin June 1 and run through September 19.

http://www.soompi.com/2014/05/30/k-pop-star-4-kicks-off-auditions-scheduled-to-begin-airing-in-november/#.U6GOEZSSxwI

'K-Pop Star 3' finalists give tips to contestants of the upcoming season on how to win the judges' hearts'K-Pop Star 3' Top 10 finalists gave their tips to the 'K-Pop Star 4' contestants on how to win the hearts of the judges!

For judge Yang Hyun Suk, the finalists shared their pointers.Jjarimongddang: "Rather than focusing on singing ability, judge Yang Hyun Suk looks at charisma. As you can tell from looking at his agency artists Big Bang, 2NE1, and more, he prefers confidence, charisma, and natural talent."Jang Ha Na: "CEO Yang Hyun Suk surprisingly likes when you groove along to the rhythm with cute motions."Kwon Jin Ah: "Judge Yang Hyun Suk is a man with a soft spot for young contestants who he can't look at cold-heartedly like the 'daughter's fool' image that he shows on broadcast sometimes... He is surprisingly weak when it comes to aegyo."Judge J.Y. Park:Bernard Park: "Showing that you're fixing the habits that they point out is important... Although it was always difficult to 'let your shoulders loose while singing', he looked fondly at the way I tried to fix it little by little, and it became a big help to honing my singing skills."Nam Young Joo: "Judge J.Y. Park likes a person who takes responsibility for the stage rather than someone who sings well... Only when you make the stage your own with your feelings, expressions, and movements along to the song can you receive compliments."Heejun: "[J.Y. Park] is the one who judges the music theory aspect [of the performance] the most meticulously, so if you miss a note, beat, or emotion, he points it out immediately... If you make eye contact with him while singing, you can lose your footing [musically], so the secret to success is avoiding eye contact with judge J.Y. Park."

Judge Yoo Hee Yeol:Kwon Jin Ah: "Judge Yoo Hee Yeol focuses on singing with emotion more, so that music technique... You need to share your story through the music rather than singing as if it was just for an audition."Jung Sae Woon: "Judge Yoo Hee Yeol likes it the most when you sing your story honestly... I remember how he stressed the importance of defining what type of music you want to pursue."Heejun: "If judge Yang Hyun Suk likes a unique image and J.Y. Park likes a correct image, then Yoo Hee Yeol places the most importance on a natural image... Showing judge Yoo Hee Yeol the reason why you want to pursue music and what kind of music you want to do is a very important point."

http://www.allkpop.com/article/2014/06/k-pop-star-3-finalists-give-tips-to-contestants-of-the-upcoming-season-on-how-to-win-the-judges-hearts
